name: @jafar/react-components
description: React common components with unified api to be used in a Jafar form (using material components as an underline layer)

scripts.build-package: rm -rf dist/* && node ../../node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js  src/components --out-dir dist --copy-files && cp package.json ./dist && cp .npmrc ./dist
scripts.build-website: rm -rf ./build && npx styleguidist build && mv styleguide build
scripts.publish-package: npm publish dist --access public || echo publish failed
scripts.deploy-website: PUBLIC_URL=https://yahoo.github.io/jafar/react-components npm run build-website && gh-pages --dist build --dest react-components
